objects.description: [APT29](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0016) has added credentials to OAuth Applications and Service Principals.(Citation: Microsoft - Customer Guidance on Recent Nation-State Cyber Attacks)(Citation: CrowdStrike StellarParticle January 2022)
